titles: The false favourit disgrac'd. and, The reward of loyalty. A tragi-comedy, never acted.
author: D'Ouvilly, George Gerbier.
publisher: Printed by Wil. Wilson, for Robert Crofts, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Crown in Chancery Lane, under Sergeants Inne.,
notes: Attributed to George Gerbier by Wing.
Item at reel 1759:19 incorrectly identified as Wing G585.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
